name: Nuxt-SSR-Firebase
description: Nuxt.js 2 app with SSR using Firebase Cloud Functions and Firebase Hosting.
author: David Royer

scripts.build: yarn clean:all && yarn build:nuxt && yarn copy:all
scripts.setup: yarn install && yarn setup:client && yarn setup:server
scripts.copy:all: yarn copy:client & yarn copy:static & yarn copy:nuxtconfig & yarn copy:workbox
scripts.clean:nuxt: rimraf src/dist & rimraf prod/server/nuxt & rimraf prod/server/nuxt.config.js
